title: Ep. 2794 - Ratnagiri Plan Is Doubtful - Taarak Mehta Ka Ooltah Chashmah - 12 August 2019
shortDesc: No matter how hard he tries, Bhide is unable to book train tickets to Ratnagiri. He tried booking online and even checked with a travel agency, but all efforts were futile. He is even trying to get help from his society members.

title: Ep. 2795 - Jethalal To The Rescue - Taarak Mehta Ka Ooltah Chashmah - 13 August 2019
shortDesc: Bhide doesn't get help from anyone and in the end, has to call Jethalal for the tickets. The problem is solved as Jethalal can manage to get the tickets. However, the tickets fall off his pocket at Iyer's place. He plans to fool around with Jethalal.

title: Ep. 2796 - Iyer Teaches Jethalal A Lesson - Taarak Mehta Ka Ooltah Chashmah - 14 August 2019
shortDesc: Bhide is really happy that Jethalal managed to get him and Madhvi tickets for Ratnagiri. He goes to Abdul's shop and waits for Jethalal. Jethalal went back to his home to bring the ticket but he couldn't find it in his pants.

title: Ep. 2797 - Independence Day Celebrations - Taarak Mehta Ka Ooltah Chashmah - 15 August 2019
shortDesc: Madhavi tries her best to know about the arrangement of the celebrations for Independence Day but fails. In the morning, after seeing the arrangements, everybody appreciates the Tapu Sena and Bhide. Stay tuned to know more!

title: Ep. 2798 - Iyer Unfurls The Flag - Taarak Mehta Ka Ooltah Chashmah - 16 August 2019
shortDesc: As the event of unfurling the flag begins, Iyer does the honors for the same and the whole Gokuldhaam celebrates Independence Day which is followed by a song from Champaklal. Stay tuned!

title: Ep. 2799 - Sonu Challenges Goli - Taarak Mehta Ka Ooltah Chashmah - 19 August 2019
shortDesc: Bhide and his wife are excited to go to Ratnagiri and they are busy packing their things. It is the middle of the night and everyone is sleeping. Tapu gets a call from Sonu and he didn't receive it. Then Sonu calls Goli and gives him a shock.

title: Ep. 2800 - All Focus On The Challenge - Taarak Mehta Ka Ooltah Chashmah - 20 August 2019
shortDesc: Tapu Sena has to stop Bhide and Madhvi from going to Ratnagiri. They will go there in a futile try to surprise Sonu. Sonu is on the way to Gokuldham. Will Tapu Sena be able to win the challenge? Stay tuned to know more!

title: Ep. 2801 - Everybody Tries To Stop Bhide - Taarak Mehta Ka Ooltah Chashmah - 21 August 2019
shortDesc: Popatlal with Abdul comes in to make an effort to stop Bhide from leaving. He tells Bhide that some Officers are coming to society and the secretary is required to be there. Bhide has a decision to make and Madhvi wants him to resign from the post.

title: Ep. 2802 - Sodhi To The Rescue - Taarak Mehta Ka Ooltah Chashmah - 22 August 2019
shortDesc: After the unmatchable effort of Champak Chacha, everyone just waits for the good news. But Bhide just didn't give up and enquired about the train from Railway. He comes down to write the Suvichar.

title: Ep. 2803 - Plan To Stop Bhide - Taarak Mehta Ka Ooltah Chashmah - 23  August 2019
shortDesc: The members of Gokuldham society try their best to stop Bhide from going to Ratnagiri. Hathi asks him to open his shirt so that he can check himwell. At first, he hesitates but later he agrees  and gets late for his trip. Stay tuned!

title: Ep. 2804 - Jethalal Attacks Sodhi - Taarak Mehta Ka Ooltah Chashmah - 26 August 2019
shortDesc: All the people at Gokuldham Society are trying to stop Bhide and his wife. They want Sonu to surprise them. Jethalal even posed as a thief and stole their luggage. However, stubborn Bhide still wants to go. A car stops them from going.

title: Ep. 2805 - Sonu Is Successful With The Surprise - Taarak Mehta Ka Ooltah Chashmah - 27 August 2019
shortDesc: The bus blocks Sodhi, Bhide, and Madhvi. From the car comes a gang of dancers. They give an amazing performance and from behind comes Sonu. She comes and at once wins everyone's hearts. Bhide and Madhvi realize that they were associated with Tapu.

title: Ep. 2806 - Jethalal's Shirt Button - Taarak Mehta Ka Ooltah Chashmah - 28 August 2019
shortDesc: It's early morning and Jethalal is worried as he needs to stitch the button of his shirt. Champaklal comes to help but couldn' help. Finally, Tapu arrives and stitches the button.

title: Ep. 2807 - Where Did Sonu Go ? - Taarak Mehta Ka Ooltah Chashmah - 29 August 2019
shortDesc: Bhide and Popatlal get into a small quarrel over the Suvichar. However, Champak Chacha clarifies the misunderstanding and clears the air between the two. Bhide has to give the food to Sonu so he goes to her college. Sonu is nowhere to be found.

title: Ep. 2808 - Bhide Is Irritated - Taarak Mehta Ka Ooltah Chashmah - 30 August 2019
shortDesc: Bhide goes to the college with tiffin for Sonu but gets to know that Sonu is not in college. Goli tells him that Sonu and Tapu are hanging out somewhere. Bhide returns home completely irritated. Stay tuned!
